casebody.data:
[Cite as 01/08/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-12.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 8, 2003

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2001-0748 and 2001-0976. State ex rel. R.T.G., Inc. v. State.

Franklin App. No. 98AP-1015, 141 Ohio App.3d 784, 2001-Ohio-4267. Reported at 98 Ohio St.3d 1, *14022002-Ohio-6716, 780 N.E.2d 998. On amici motions for leave to file under S.Ct.Prac.R. XI. Motions denied.

Moyer, C.J., dissents. Douglas, J., participated in the decision of this motion before his retirement.

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., dissent. Douglas, J., participated in the decision of this motion before his retirement.
